# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $15000. Considering its immense potential benefits, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $20000. This is an opportunity to secure a game-changing solution at a competitive advantage. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially partnering with you on this exciting venture. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
